T02TD1369E:216b-1: shr'i k'a la tsakra au pa de sha s'urya tsandra s'a dha na n'a ma /
T02TD1369E:216b-3: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i gdams ngag nyi ma zla ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1369E:216b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1369E:216b-5: bhi ku ni zhes bya ba'i pandi ta /
T02TD1369E:216b-7: rig pa'i gnas lnga kun la mkhas pa /
T02TD1369E:216b-9: sa dang po'i bden pa mthong /
T02TD1369E:216b-10: 'jam dpal gyi lung bstan thob nas mu khyud 'dzin ri'i 'gram du rkang mgyogs kyis byon /
T02TD1369E:216b-11: rigs gsum mgon po'i brgyud pa bram ze nyi ma'i shing rta la dus kyi 'khor lo dam pa dang po gsan /
T02TD1369E:216b-12: dbang bsgrub thabs dang bcas pa thob /
T02TD1369E:216b-13: de'i dus su srod la rgyal po zla ba bzang po byon /
T02TD1369E:216b-14: khyod yul dbus su 'gro ba la phyi dus kyi 'khor lo shes kyang nang dus kyi 'khor lo mi shes so zer ro //
T02TD1369E:216b-15: de khyed la zhu byas pas nang g-yo ba rlung la gdams pa /
T02TD1369E:216b-16: bde ba ye shes rdo rje yis //
T02TD1369E:216b-17: phrin las drug gi 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD1369E:216b-19: ye shes lnga ni bskyed mdzad pa //
T02TD1369E:216b-21: bag chags rlung gis bskyod nas ni ;
T02TD1369E:216b-22: /'gro ba rmongs shing sdug bsngal bas //
T02TD1369E:216b-23: gsal byed 'khor lo bshad par bya //
T02TD1369E:216b-24: bskyed dang gnas dang dbye ba dang //
T02TD1369E:216b-25: rtsis dang lam du bya ba dang //
T02TD1369E:216b-27: rnam shes bskyod pa'i rlung 'byung ste //
T02TD1369E:216b-28: rlung las me ni skyes pa'o //
T02TD1369E:216b-29: de las chu dang sa 'byung ste //
T02TD1369E:216b-30: nam mkha' kun du khyab pa'o //
T02TD1369E:216b-31: rlung las skyes pa'i dug lnga yis //
T02TD1369E:216b-33: pho rlung mo rlung ma ning rlung //
T02TD1369E:216b-34: thod rgal pa dang bzhi ru gnas //
T02TD1369E:216b-35: yang na 'byung ba lnga yi rlung //
T02TD1369E:216b-36: rnam shes nam mkha'i tshul du gnas //
T02TD1369E:217a-0: @217a * // ming dang gnas dang kha dog dang //
T02TD1369E:217a-1: rgyu dang byed pa'i las dang ni //
T02TD1369E:217a-2: zin dang log rengs bcos thabs dang //
T02TD1369E:217a-3: ngag dang yon tan bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1369E:217a-4: ye shes khams las thur sel dang //
T02TD1369E:217a-5: stong pa dag las srog gi rlung //
T02TD1369E:217a-7: rlung gi rlung las mnyam gnas dang //
T02TD1369E:217a-8: me la gyen du rgyu ba ste //
T02TD1369E:217a-9: chu la khyab par byed pa nyid //
T02TD1369E:217a-10: mkha' las rlung 'byur [?] de las ni //
T02TD1369E:217a-11: klu dang rus sbal rtsangs pa dang //
T02TD1369E:217a-12: lha sbyin dang ni nor las rgyal //
T02TD1369E:217a-13: lnga po sa rlung me dang ni //
T02TD1369E:217a-14: chu dang sa las rim 'byung ste //
T02TD1369E:217a-15: drug gi bdag nyid bcu ming can ;
T02TD1369E:217a-16: / sa lte chu snying me mgrin dang //
T02TD1369E:217a-17: rlung dpral mkha' gtsug ye shes gsang //
T02TD1369E:217a-20: sa ser chu dkar me ni dmar //
T02TD1369E:217a-21: rlung gnag mkha' sngo ye shes ljang //
T02TD1369E:217a-22: sa chu me rlung nam mkha' ni //
T02TD1369E:217a-23: bcu gnyis bcu gsum bcu bzhi dang //
T02TD1369E:217a-24: bco lnga bcu drug phyi ru rgyu //
T02TD1369E:217a-25: phyir 'phel nang du thung du rgyu //
T02TD1369E:217a-26: ye shes sa mkha' mnyam du ste //
T02TD1369E:217a-27: sna bug gnyis nas rgyu ba'o //
T02TD1369E:217a-28: 'og nas sa dang g-yon du chu //
T02TD1369E:217a-29: g-yas su mi dang steng du rlung //
T02TD1369E:217a-30: bzhi dbus nam mkha' rgyu ba ste //
T02TD1369E:217a-31: sna bug gnyis mnyam ye shes so //
T02TD1369E:217a-32: khyim ni bcu gnyis dbye ba yis //
T02TD1369E:217a-33: dus sbyor 'pho chen bcu gnyis la //
T02TD1369E:217a-34: 'byung lnga rlung gi dbye ba yis //
T02TD1369E:217a-37: sum brgya drug cu rgyu ba yis //
T02TD1369E:217a-38: dus sbyor bcu gnyis 'pho chen re'ang //
T02TD1369E:217a-39: stong dang brgyad brgya rgyu ba ste //
T02TD1369E:217a-40: zhag gcig rtog rlung nyi khri dang //
T02TD1369E:217a-41: dgu brgya nyer lnga rgyu ba'o //
T02TD1369E:217a-43: bcu gcig bzhi cha chad pa yis //
T02TD1369E:217a-44: dus sbyor bcu gnyis mtshams re nas //
T02TD1369E:217a-45: lnga bcu rtsa drug bzhi cha rgyu //
T02TD1369E:217a-46: zhag gcig ye rlung drug brgya dang //
T02TD1369E:217a-47: bdun cu rtsa lnga rgyu ba'o //
T02TD1369E:217a-48: skyes bu khams snyoms zhag gcig la //
T02TD1369E:217a-49: nyi khri chig stong drug brgya rgyu //
T02TD1369E:217a-51: brgyal dang gzas zin ting 'dzin thob //
T02TD1369E:217a-52: de min 'jig rten rlung du zad //
T02TD1369E:217a-53: de ni rlung gi rgyu ba'o //
T02TD1369E:217a-54: gti mug sa la nga rgyal chu //
T02TD1369E:217b-0: 'dod chags me la phrag @217b dog rlung //
T02TD1369E:217b-1: zhe sdang mkha' ste ser sna'i sems //
T02TD1369E:217b-2: ye shes khams kyi 'byed par bshad //
T02TD1369E:217b-3: sems can kun gyi srog gyur ba'i //
T02TD1369E:217b-4: rlung gis las kun byed pa'o //
T02TD1369E:217b-5: mthun dang mi mthun zin pa yi //
T02TD1369E:217b-6: gnyis stobs gsum stobs shes par bya //
T02TD1369E:217b-8: thur sel log rengs rtsa chu sri //
T02TD1369E:217b-9: gyen rgyu log rengs dbugs mi bde //
T02TD1369E:217b-10: me mnyam log rengs rmu chu skran //
T02TD1369E:217b-11: khyab byed rlung log rengs pa na //
T02TD1369E:217b-12: mdze dkar la sogs nad mad byed //
T02TD1369E:217b-14: dmigs dang byin rlabs bde ba bsgom //
T02TD1369E:217b-15: zas dang spyod lam sman dpyad dang //
T02TD1369E:217b-16: rten 'brel gyis ni bcos par bya //
T02TD1369E:217b-17: rlung sems 'dres shing dag pa yi //
T02TD1369E:217b-18: mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1369E:217b-19: sngags rnams kun gyis byin rlob pas //
T02TD1369E:217b-20: phrin las bzhi ni rtsol med 'grub //
T02TD1369E:217b-21: sa rlung yon tan 'chi ba med //
T02TD1369E:217b-22: me yis bkrag la drod dang ldan //
T02TD1369E:217b-23: chu yis bde dang snum la 'gril //
T02TD1369E:217b-24: rlung gis gsal dang yang bar byed //
T02TD1369E:217b-25: nam mkha' nam mkha' lta bur 'grub //
T02TD1369E:217b-26: ye shes yon tan bsam mi khyab //
T02TD1369E:217b-27: gzhan gyi rlung rtsis phyi nas brtsi //
T02TD1369E:217b-28: phyogs dang dus dang byed pa'i las //
T02TD1369E:217b-29: gzugs dang dbyibs dang kha dog dang //
T02TD1369E:217b-30: sgra gdangs sgra yi byed pa dang //
T02TD1369E:217b-31: rgyu tshul spyod lam la sogs pa //
T02TD1369E:217b-33: dgra gshed grogs su 'gyur ba dang //
T02TD1369E:217b-34: btang snyoms byed pa'i rlung rtsis brtsi //
T02TD1369E:217b-35: 'di ni phyi yi rlung rtsis so //
T02TD1369E:217b-36: nang gi rlung rtsis nang nas brtsi //
T02TD1369E:217b-37: a'a li k'a li rab dbye bas //
T02TD1369E:217b-38: khams drug rlung ni rtsis kyis 'jug / g-yas g-yon dbus nas rgyu ba yi //
T02TD1369E:217b-39: rlung drug byed las brtag pa yis //
T02TD1369E:217b-40: bzang ngan byed las shes par bya //
T02TD1369E:217b-41: 'di ni nang gi rlung rtsis so //
T02TD1369E:217b-42: rnal 'byor rig pa'i rtsis shes nas //
T02TD1369E:217b-43: 'char tshul gzugs dang kha dog dang //
T02TD1369E:217b-44: spyod lam tshe dang dbang thang dang //
T02TD1369E:217b-45: phan gnod las kyi ltas kyang shes //
T02TD1369E:217b-47: nad dang rten 'brel phan yang shes //
T02TD1369E:217b-49: khyad par phrin las bzhi la 'jug / pho rtsa mo rtsa ma ning rtsa //
T02TD1369E:217b-50: pho rlung mo rlung ma ning rlung //
T02TD1369E:217b-51: thod rgal bzhi yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1369E:218a-0: @218a * // 'dis kyang phyi nang rtsi bar nus //
T02TD1369E:218a-1: sngon 'gro sbyor ba ldan pa yis //
T02TD1369E:218a-2: lam ni bya ba'i rim pa ni //
T02TD1369E:218a-4: yi ge gsum gyis rtsa lam sbyangs //
T02TD1369E:218a-5: rdo rje skyil krung sogs gnas pas //
T02TD1369E:218a-6: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa yis //
T02TD1369E:218a-7: rlung ni lam du byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1369E:218a-9: rlung lnga aa ba dh'u t'i ra gzung //
T02TD1369E:218a-10: rgyu ba dag pa rang gnas bsgom //
T02TD1369E:218a-11: zhag lnga aa ba dh'u t'i ru //
T02TD1369E:218a-13: bum pa can dang btsan thabs kyis //
T02TD1369E:218a-14: bcings dang zhi bar byas pa yis //
T02TD1369E:218a-15: nor bu'i me la srog zhugs pa'i //
T02TD1369E:218a-16: bde ba skye bar nges pa ste //
T02TD1369E:218a-18: mgo bo na na gzhag par bya //
T02TD1369E:218a-19: thur sel rgyu ba 'jam rlung gzung //
T02TD1369E:218a-20: rlung gi nad rnams spong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1369E:218a-21: srog dang rtsol bas bad kan sel //
T02TD1369E:218a-22: btang bas mkhris pa sel par byed //
T02TD1369E:218a-23: 'dus pa'i nad la steng 'og dgag / dangs ma'i sbyor bas sel bar byed //
T02TD1369E:218a-24: lte ba'i 'og tu srog rlung dgag / ma lus pa ni sel bar byed //
T02TD1369E:218a-25: khyad par rtsol ba'i rlung gis sel //
T02TD1369E:218a-26: aa ba dh'u t'ir dangs par byed //
T02TD1369E:218a-27: kha sbyor rlung gis rkyen snang bsrung //
T02TD1369E:218a-28: reg dang ral gri bcud dbang po //
T02TD1369E:218a-29: bdud rtsi 'bras bu ri lu dang //
T02TD1369E:218a-30: gi wang dang ni mig sman dang //
T02TD1369E:218a-31: rkang la byugs dang mthil lam brgyad //
T02TD1369E:218a-33: mchog gi 'bras bu ster bar byed //
T02TD1369E:218a-35: yang nam gung la rgyal po grags pa byon nas //
T02TD1369E:218a-36: khyod 'dzam bu'i gling gi yul dbus su 'gro ba la nad pa lto gos la sred pa mang bas /
T02TD1369E:218a-37: nang gnas pa rtsa gtum mo la gdams pa 'di dgos gsungs nas gdams pa /
T02TD1369E:218a-38: ji ltar sgom pa rtsa yi gnad //
T02TD1369E:218a-39: rab tu phye ste bshad par bya //
T02TD1369E:218a-40: brgyad khri dang ni bzhi stong dang //
T02TD1369E:218a-42: pa spu bye ba ji tsam par //
T02TD1369E:218a-43: rtsa yi grangs kyang de bzhin te //
T02TD1369E:218a-44: byed pa las kyi rtsa rnams ni //
T02TD1369E:218a-45: stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang //
T02TD1369E:218a-46: sum cu rtsa gnyis dag tu brjod //
T02TD1369E:218a-47: la la nyi ma'i rtsa yis ni //
T02TD1369E:218a-48: gling bzhi gling phran rnams la bskor //
T02TD1369E:218a-49: ra sa zla ba'i rtsa yis kyang //
T02TD1369E:218b-0: gong @218b bzhin bskor nas gnas pa'o //
T02TD1369E:218b-1: 'khor lo rnams kyi rtsa yi gtso //
T02TD1369E:218b-2: gtsug tor bzhi la snying gar brgyad //
T02TD1369E:218b-3: spyi bo ru ni mi yi bdag / mgrin pa ru ni so yi grangs //
T02TD1369E:218b-4: lte bar brgyad kyis brgyad bsgres pa //
T02TD1369E:218b-5: gsang bar rgyal po nyis 'gyur nyid //
T02TD1369E:218b-6: rtsa ba lte ba'i dkyil nas gyes //
T02TD1369E:218b-7: rtse mo don snying lnga la zug / don snying las ni rtsa lnga gyes //
T02TD1369E:218b-8: rtse mo skye mched lnga la zug / yul lnga dag ni myong bar byed / lte ba'i dkyil nas rtsa bzhi gyes //
T02TD1369E:218b-9: brgyad kyis lus ni skyed par byed //
T02TD1369E:218b-10: rtsa yi gtso bo gsum du bshad //
T02TD1369E:218b-11: aa ba dh'u t'i zhes bya ba //
T02TD1369E:218b-12: lhan cig skyes pa skyed par byed //
T02TD1369E:218b-13: 'di ni rtsa yi rgyal por bshad //
T02TD1369E:218b-14: sngon 'gro bya ba rdzogs nas kyang //
T02TD1369E:218b-15: sbyang zhing gnad la bor bar bya //
T02TD1369E:218b-16: gling bzhi ri rab dag la bsdu //
T02TD1369E:218b-17: ri rab srog shing bsrang bar bya //
T02TD1369E:218b-18: rgyu ba'i nyi zla gzung bar bya //
T02TD1369E:218b-19: nyi zla'i 'od kyis rab bsros te //
T02TD1369E:218b-20: ram las glog gi rgyun byung bas //
T02TD1369E:218b-21: mtshan nyid bzhi dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD1369E:218b-22: aom h'um a'a: yi bar du bsreg / ham las babs pas bdud rtsi'i rgyun //
T02TD1369E:218b-23: yig 'bru gsos kyi bar du bsgom //
T02TD1369E:218b-24: rgya mtsho'i dkyil du nyi ma dgod //
T02TD1369E:218b-25: ram las byung ba gtum mo'i mes //
T02TD1369E:218b-26: khams gsum po ni me ru 'bar //
T02TD1369E:218b-27: ji ltar sbyin sreg me yis ni //
T02TD1369E:218b-28: til mar dgang blugs de bzhin no //
T02TD1369E:218b-29: ri rab bskyod dang rlung lha ste //
T02TD1369E:218b-30: bud shing bzang po bsten par bya //
T02TD1369E:218b-31: glog gi me yi rtse mo yis //
T02TD1369E:218b-32: spyi bo'i zla ba gzhu bar bya //
T02TD1369E:218b-33: gang dang gang gis thig le bzhu //
T02TD1369E:218b-34: 'di las mgrin pa snying ga dang //
T02TD1369E:218b-35: lte ba gsang ba ru ni 'gog / rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal to //
T02TD1369E:218b-36: 'byung po'i dug rnams ma lus sel //
T02TD1369E:218b-37: nad las rnam par rgyal po thob //
T02TD1369E:218b-38: gtum mo yon tan brgyad dang ldan //
T02TD1369E:218b-39: bde ba dam pa ston pa dang //
T02TD1369E:218b-40: chos kyi dbyings ni ston par byed //
T02TD1369E:218b-41: thun bzhi rim pas nyams su blang //
T02TD1369E:218b-42: zhag bdun nyi shu rtsa gcig la //
T02TD1369E:218b-43: skye dang brtan par byed pa yin //
T02TD1369E:218b-45: yang nam tho rangs rgyal po padma dkar po byon nas //
T02TD1369E:218b-46: khyed 'dzam bu'i gling gi yul dbus 'gyur tshal de na //
T02TD1369E:219a-1: ba de la mchog tu sred //
T02TD1369E:219a-2: che thung nad mang dbang thang chung bas nang 'gyur ba byang chub kyi sems la gdams pa 'di dgos so gsungs nas gdams pa /
T02TD1369E:219a-3: gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen la //
T02TD1369E:219a-4: gsang ba'i snying po 'di skad thos //
T02TD1369E:219a-5: khyod la rab tu bshad par bya //
T02TD1369E:219a-6: rtags dang nyams pa'i nyes dmigs dang //
T02TD1369E:219a-7: nyams pa'i tshul dang mi nyams bsrung //
T02TD1369E:219a-8: dangs 'phel thabs dang rgyas pa dang //
T02TD1369E:219a-9: dangs pa'i yon tan bstan pa'o //
T02TD1369E:219a-10: lus dang rtsa yi sgo rnams dang //
T02TD1369E:219a-11: skra dang ba spu bye ba dang //
T02TD1369E:219a-12: mdog dang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang //
T02TD1369E:219a-13: sems nyams skad kyi gdangs dang ni //
T02TD1369E:219a-14: grib ma gnas khang lus las shes //
T02TD1369E:219a-15: mtshan ltas rtog la drang srong mkhas //
T02TD1369E:219a-16: bde gsal med pa'i sgyid pa sgyur //
T02TD1369E:219a-17: stobs chung shed dma' snying mi dga' //
T02TD1369E:219a-18: bkrag mdangs lus stobs med pa dang //
T02TD1369E:219a-19: brang la ba spu log pa dang //
T02TD1369E:219a-20: mi'am ci la yi dags lus //
T02TD1369E:219a-21: ngag nyams thos la snying rlung 'jug / nad mang bgegs 'jug tshe yang thung //
T02TD1369E:219a-22: 'dod yon chu yis skams pa yis //
T02TD1369E:219a-23: dbang thang chung zhing longs spyod ngan //
T02TD1369E:219a-24: byang sems dpag bsam skams pa yis //
T02TD1369E:219a-26: pho mo dbang du mi 'gyur zhing //
T02TD1369E:219a-27: mthun pa dag kyang dbral bar 'gyur //
T02TD1369E:219a-28: mi ma yin rnams mi 'du zhing //
T02TD1369E:219a-29: zhi drag la sogs 'grub pa min //
T02TD1369E:219a-31: dngos grub dag kyang nyams par byed //
T02TD1369E:219a-32: gnas khar lud pa byin med cing //
T02TD1369E:219a-33: sa yi snum yang med par 'gyur //
T02TD1369E:219a-34: mi yi nor bu med pa la //
T02TD1369E:219a-35: de yi bde legs ga la 'byung //
T02TD1369E:219a-37: gdon dang bag chags chags skyes 'dzag / kha zas kyis kyang 'dzag par byed //
T02TD1369E:219a-38: mig dang rna ba sna dang ni //
T02TD1369E:219a-39: kha dang dbang po dag nas 'dzag / khyab byed thig le zhes bya ba //
T02TD1369E:219a-40: rdul dang gdongs nas 'dzag par byed //
T02TD1369E:219a-41: chu dang rtsa 'khru'i dus su ni //
T02TD1369E:219a-43: me dang nyi ma ngal dub las //
T02TD1369E:219a-44: nad drag po yi rgyun las ni //
T02TD1369E:219a-45: 'di rnams kyis ni skems par byed //
T02TD1369E:219b-0: sna rtsa @219b rlung ni kha dha la lam //
T02TD1369E:219b-1: de bzhen kha dang 'og rtsa dha la //
T02TD1369E:219b-2: nyi ma 'dor par byed pa yin //
T02TD1369E:219b-3: mo yi nyams pa'i rkyen dag ni //
T02TD1369E:219b-4: dkar po pho dang cung zad mtshungs //
T02TD1369E:219b-5: khyad par chags skyes chags spyod 'dzag / tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi dang //
T02TD1369E:219b-6: nya dang gnam stong gang yin la //
T02TD1369E:219b-7: phyi ru sgra gcan rgyas pa yis //
T02TD1369E:219b-9: kha sna nu ma nas kyang 'dor //
T02TD1369E:219b-10: rgyu dang rkyen dang byed pa'i las //
T02TD1369E:219b-11: gnod pa'i 'bras bu shes par bya //
T02TD1369E:219b-12: 'dzag gnyis thur sel dbang du byas //
T02TD1369E:219b-14: sngags dang rdzas dang rten 'brel bsrung //
T02TD1369E:219b-15: rgyud dag gsang rlung dbang du bya //
T02TD1369E:219b-16: glang mo myos skad shes par bya //
T02TD1369E:219b-17: zas ngan spangs la zas mchog bsten //
T02TD1369E:219b-18: steng rlung 'gog pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1369E:219b-20: khong gseng mkha' 'gro dh'u t'ir gzhug /
T02TD1369E:219b-21: drod kyi sbyor ba la sogs kyis //
T02TD1369E:219b-22: gtum mo bsgom zhing dgram par bya //
T02TD1369E:219b-23: drag spyod spangs la bag yod bsten //
T02TD1369E:219b-24: drang srong rig pa sman du gtang //
T02TD1369E:219b-25: gnad kyis drug rnams dag par bya //
T02TD1369E:219b-26: nyi ma ri rab dbus su sba //
T02TD1369E:219b-27: dgram pa'i sbyor ba shes par bya //
T02TD1369E:219b-28: rgya mtsho dkyil gyi sgra gcan gyis //
T02TD1369E:219b-29: nyi zla gnyis po zos nas ni //
T02TD1369E:219b-30: nyi zla ri rab rtse ru drang //
T02TD1369E:219b-32: de 'dra sbyor ba sna tshogs ni //
T02TD1369E:219b-33: kun mkhyen rig pa de la dris //
T02TD1369E:219b-34: rnal 'byor dbang rab rnams kyis ni //
T02TD1369E:219b-35: don dam phyag rgya che bsten nas //
T02TD1369E:219b-36: mi g-yo bsam gtan sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1369E:219b-37: rgyu mthun bde stong ting 'dzin bsgom //
T02TD1369E:219b-38: lo gsum zla phyed gsum gyis ni //
T02TD1369E:219b-39: mchog gi dngos grub thob par gsungs //
T02TD1369E:219b-41: sems brtag ye shes phyag rgya bsten //
T02TD1369E:219b-42: rang lus thabs ldan sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1369E:219b-43: cha mthun bde stong ting 'dzin pa bsgom //
T02TD1369E:219b-44: gzugs khams lha dang thun mong gi / dngos grub thob pa rgyal bas gsungs //
T02TD1369E:219b-45: rnal 'byor dbang tha rnams kyis ni //
T02TD1369E:219b-46: mtshan chos ldan pa'i las rgya bsten //
T02TD1369E:219b-47: snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1369E:220a-0: 'dod khams lha dang thun mong gi / dngos grub thob par @220a * //
T02TD1369E:220a-2: chags can bde stong spel 'dod kyis //
T02TD1369E:220a-3: kha sbyor rlung bcings 'dzin bsgrubs te //
T02TD1369E:220a-4: mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bu mo la //
T02TD1369E:220a-5: skyabs 'gro dbang bskur snod du bya //
T02TD1369E:220a-6: lus la rigs drug sa bon dgod //
T02TD1369E:220a-7: skyed dang sdud pa'i rim pa yis //
T02TD1369E:220a-8: rdo rje padma byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1369E:220a-9: gzugs sgra chags pa rgyas par bya //
T02TD1369E:220a-10: spyod des dangs ma g-yo bar bya //
T02TD1369E:220a-11: sngon 'gro gsum gyis sbyang byas nas //
T02TD1369E:220a-12: 'du shes gsum ldan bsgom pa yis //
T02TD1369E:220a-13: dngos gzhi snyoms 'jug sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1369E:220a-14: dbab bzung bde stong ro myong bya //
T02TD1369E:220a-15: rjes su ldog cing gnas su bsdus //
T02TD1369E:220a-16: dgram pa gnyis med bsres la bgom //
T02TD1369E:220a-17: dus sbal 'gros su dal bus dbab //
T02TD1369E:220a-18: dgos pa gnyis la mkhas par bya //
T02TD1369E:220a-19: thur sel rlung ni gsum du 'gyur //
T02TD1369E:220a-21: khyab byed rgyas pa'i rlung gis gzung //
T02TD1369E:220a-22: rgyun 'grogs bskyod pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1369E:220a-23: zla ba 'dzin la mkhas pa yin //
T02TD1369E:220a-24: thur sel dbang mi thob pa na //
T02TD1369E:220a-27: rab 'jug rlung gis gnas su gzung //
T02TD1369E:220a-29: yi ge gsum gyis gyen la zlog / tshangs par lhan skyes myong bsdus pas //
T02TD1369E:220a-30: mgo bo na na dgram par bya //
T02TD1369E:220a-31: sems dang rlung ni rim gyis dgram //
T02TD1369E:220a-32: nyi shu rtsa gcig rim pas so //
T02TD1369E:220a-33: rlung sems gnyis su med bsres la //
T02TD1369E:220a-34: zhen pa ye shes gnyis med bya //
T02TD1369E:220a-36: dangs ma'i dangs ma yul la 'dren //
T02TD1369E:220a-37: dang sa ma'i bde ba skyes pa dang //
T02TD1369E:220a-38: bde ba rtsal sbyang thabs la mkhas //
T02TD1369E:220a-40: yul la chags pa skyes ba na //
T02TD1369E:220a-41: dangs ma'i dangs ma yul la 'dzag / nang du dngos 'dzin skyes pa na //
T02TD1369E:220a-42: dangs ma'i dngos po nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD1369E:220a-43: zhen pa dang bcas spyod pa na //
T02TD1369E:220a-44: dangs ma'i dngos po rnyed par byed //
T02TD1369E:220a-45: gnyis med gnas na dangs ma 'phel //
T02TD1369E:220a-46: gang yang der shes dangs ma rgyas //
T02TD1369E:220a-47: yon tan tshogs ni dangs ma'i stobs //
T02TD1369E:220a-48: gsal ba'i dangs ma stong pa nyid //
T02TD1369E:220b-0: rtog @220b pa'i skyon bral zla ba yis //
T02TD1369E:220b-1: nyon mongs gdung ba sel bar byed //
T02TD1369E:220b-2: stong pa'i dangs ma gsal 'od can //
T02TD1369E:220b-3: thugs rje ye shes nyi ma yis //
T02TD1369E:220b-4: ma rig sdug bsngal sel bar byed //
T02TD1369E:220b-5: bag chags sprin gyis ma gos par //
T02TD1369E:220b-6: nyi zla mchog tu rgyas par bya //
T02TD1369E:220b-7: gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen gyis //
T02TD1369E:220b-8: de skad gsungs pa bdag gis thos / dus kyi 'khor lo gsang ba'i skad //
T02TD1369E:220b-9: gzhan du bshad pa ma yin no //
T02TD1369E:220b-10: nyi zla sku la rgyas pa yis //
T02TD1369E:220b-11: bkram mdangs gzi brjid chen por ldan //
T02TD1369E:220b-12: snum zhing 'gril la pags pa dangs //
T02TD1369E:220b-13: nad med bde ba rdo rje ldan //
T02TD1369E:220b-14: byin chen dangs dang ldan pa dan /
T02TD1369E:220b-15: bde bskyed tshangs pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur //
T02TD1369E:220b-16: gsal bas phyi nang chos rnams shes //
T02TD1369E:220b-17: rtog med bdag 'dzin rang sar grol //
T02TD1369E:220b-18: bde stong rdo rje sdug bsngal 'joms //
T02TD1369E:220b-19: lus dang rus pa sems la smin //
T02TD1369E:220b-20: yon tan yon tan bsam mi khyab //
T02TD1369E:220b-21: lus kyi thig le rgyas pa yis //
T02TD1369E:220b-22: tshe dang longs spyod dbang thang dang //
T02TD1369E:220b-24: kun rdzob bde bas sdug bsngal zhi //
T02TD1369E:220b-25: don dam thig les 'khrul pa zhi //
T02TD1369E:220b-26: gnyis med thig les sgrib pa zhi //
T02TD1369E:220b-27: 'di ni zhi pa'i phrin las so //
T02TD1369E:220b-29: mo chags kun gyi yid du 'ong //
T02TD1369E:220b-30: lha klu gnod sbyin ma mo yang //
T02TD1369E:220b-31: dbang 'gyur mi yi smos ci dgos //
T02TD1369E:220b-32: tshangs pa la sogs dbang du 'du //
T02TD1369E:220b-33: skyes pa rnams ni smos ci dgos //
T02TD1369E:220b-34: rdzas dang 'dod yon de bzhin no //
T02TD1369E:220b-35: phyogs skyong rnams ni dbang du 'du //
T02TD1369E:220b-36: drag po'i las la mtshon char 'gyur //
T02TD1369E:220b-37: gsad dang bskrad dang rmongs dang rengs //
T02TD1369E:220b-38: kun la dbang bsgyur rdo rje yin //
T02TD1369E:220b-39: rlung sems 'dres la rgyas pa yi //
T02TD1369E:220b-40: ting 'dzin stobs kyis gang yang nus //
T02TD1369E:220b-41: phal cher rangs pa'i thig le yis //
T02TD1369E:220b-42: sa 'og gter rnams mthong ba dang //
T02TD1369E:220b-43: lus kyi rtsa mthong mun pa sel //
T02TD1369E:220b-44: dangs mas sems ni bde bar 'char //
T02TD1369E:220b-46: dangs ma'i dangs ma gyur pa yis //
T02TD1369E:220b-47: lus la bde ba rgyas pa dang //
T02TD1369E:220b-48: khro gtum stag sogs ldan bar byed //
T02TD1369E:220b-49: rab tu dangs pas mchog mthong 'gyur //
T02TD1369E:221a-0: mchog tu dangs pas mngon shes drug / de bzhin @221a * //
T02TD1369E:221a-2: dngas ma stobs 'gyur zhes bya ba //
T02TD1369E:221a-3: sred med bu yi stobs sogs thob //
T02TD1369E:221a-4: dngas ma bcud ces bya ba yis //
T02TD1369E:221a-5: snang ba bde bar 'char ba dang //
T02TD1369E:221a-6: khams gsum ro la spyod par nus //
T02TD1369E:221a-7: mi g-yo dngas ma zhes bya bas //
T02TD1369E:221a-8: 'khor ba bde bar shar nas ni //
T02TD1369E:221a-9: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob bo //
T02TD1369E:221a-10: dbang sgyur dngas mas sbrul ba 'gyed //
T02TD1369E:221a-12: mchog dang mchog min sbrul pa nus //
T02TD1369E:221a-13: rdo rje dngas ma zhes bya las //
T02TD1369E:221a-14: ji lta ba dang ji snyed shes //
T02TD1369E:221a-15: sa rnams dbang phyug thub pa'i sku //
T02TD1369E:221a-16: zag med rnam dag zhing du ni //
T02TD1369E:221a-17: zag med rdo rje'i skur bstan nas //
T02TD1369E:221a-18: nyid dang mnyam pa'i 'khor rnams la //
T02TD1369E:221a-19: bde ba chen po'i chos bstan nas //
T02TD1369E:221a-20: 'khor dang bcas pa mngon sangs rgyas //
T02TD1369E:221a-21: sangs rgyas gtso bor dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1369E:221a-23: de nas bla ma bhi ku pa yis dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshig dang don du bcas pa spyan drangs 'ongs pas //
T02TD1369E:221a-24: mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'i mu khyud 'dzin ri thal thal bskyal nas /
T02TD1369E:221a-25: pandi ta khyod kyis nged kyi mdzod stong par bzhag zer ro //
T02TD1369E:221a-26: de lta na rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dzam bu'i gling du byon la chos 'di rnams kyi bka' srung gyis [*gis?] byas pas bka' srung byed par dam bcas te /
T02TD1369E:221a-27: rdo rje'i mgur re blangs pa ni rin chen mkha' 'gro na re /
T02TD1369E:221a-28: aa ba dh'u t'i rtsa yi ma mchog / dang po'i mdud pa khrol nas ni //
T02TD1369E:221a-29: rlung sems dbyer med 'dzud shes na //
T02TD1369E:221a-30: lhan cig skyes pa mngon du byed //
T02TD1369E:221a-31: rtsa lam sbyongs shig rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1369E:221a-34: rlung gi rgyal po srog gi rlung //
T02TD1369E:221a-35: 'dzin cing dag par byed shes na //
T02TD1369E:221a-36: phung po rdo rje dbang byas te //
T02TD1369E:221a-37: mkha' spyod gnas su 'gro par nus //
T02TD1369E:221a-38: srog rtsol sbyongs shig rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1369E:221a-41: ae la wam gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1369E:221a-42: dga' ba gsum la rim gyis bslab //
T02TD1369E:221a-43: lhan cig skyes pa ngo sprad pas //
T02TD1369E:221a-44: mtshams med lnga pa byas pas kyang //
T02TD1369E:221a-45: rang byung ye shes rtogs par byed //
T02TD1369E:221a-46: bde ba sbyongs shig rnal 'byor ba //
T02TD1369E:221b-1: ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i don //
T02TD1369E:221b-2: dri ma med pa ngo shes pas //
T02TD1369E:221b-4: rang rig sangs rgyas bla na med //
T02TD1369E:221b-5: gnas lug rtogs shig rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1369E:221b-7: gsang tshig snying gtam du gdams te rang gnas su gshegs so //
T02TD1369E:221b-8: de nas bla ma yul dbus 'gyur tshal du byon nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dar par mdzad do //
T02TD1369E:221b-9: gnas pa rtsa yi dus 'khor gyis //
T02TD1369E:221b-10: phyi nang chos kun shes par byed //
T02TD1369E:221b-11: g-yo ba rlung gi dus 'khor gyis //
T02TD1369E:221b-12: srid dang zhi ba kha los sgyur //
T02TD1369E:221b-14: phun sum tshogs pa skyed par byed //
T02TD1369E:221b-15: 'khor lo gsum gyi don thos nas //
T02TD1369E:221b-16: 'khor lo gsum gyi don bkod pas //
T02TD1369E:221b-17: khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams //
T02TD1369E:221b-18: sku gsum mngon du rtogs par shog / dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i man ngag /'khor lo gsum gyi rim pa nyi ma zla ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
T02TD1369E:221b-20: // / rgya gar phyogs dza ga dha la'i pandi ta ma h'a bi bh'u ti tsandra sa //
T02TD1369E:221b-21: dpal ding ri glang 'khor du sgra rang 'gyur du bsgyur nas gsungs pa'o//
